arts.ttl: ‘Bajada de pantalones’ de Boniface y subidón para Xabi Alonso
arts.sum: Insólita manera de celebrar los tantos del delantero nigeriano del Leverkusen, que hizo un doblete. Terrier abrió la cuenta. Wirtz marcó de penalti tras provocarlo Grimaldo.

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Leverkusen back on track, Stuttgart earn first win, Leipzig fail against Union
arts.sum: A highly intriguing set of results in the latest set of Bundesliga 15:30 kickoffs concluded with German European representatives Bayer 04 Leverkusen, VfB Stuttgart, and Eintracht Frankfurt taking all three points from respective opponents Hoffenheim, Gladbach, and Wolfsburg. SC Freiburg were also able to prevail at home over VfL Bochum. In the only match to end in a draw, RB Leipzig and 1. FC Union Berlin played to a 0-0 scoreless stalemate at the Red Bull Arena.

arts.ttl: Exequiel Palacios fit enough to be included in Bayer Leverkusen’s matchday squad to face Hoffenheim
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen head coach Xabi Alonso has confirmed that midfielder Exequiel Palacios is fit enough to be included in the matchday squad to face Hoffenheim on Saturday. The Argentine has…

arts.ttl: Alonso to make late decision on Frimpong's involvement against Hoffenheim
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen coach Xabi Alonso says he hasn't yet decided whether Jeremie Frimpong will start against Hoffenheim.

arts.ttl: Hoffenheim vs Bayer Leverkusen: Champions look to bounce back on the road
arts.sum: Reigning champions Bayer Leverkusen look ahead to a trip to the PreZero arena as they look to bounce back against Hoffenheim after suffering their first domestic defeat since May 2023 against RB Leipzig.

arts.ttl: Nordi Mukiele could make his debut for Bayer Leverkusen on Saturday
arts.sum: kicker reports that Nordi Mukiele and Robert Andrich could both start for Bayer Leverkusen against Hoffenheim on Saturday. With the Champions League beginning next week and Leverkusen facing a trip to…

arts.ttl: Preview: Hoffenheim vs. Bayer Leverkusen - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Hoffenheim and Bayer Leverkusen, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Hoffenheim sign Lenz on a free
arts.sum: TSG 1899 Hoffenheim confirmed the pick up go German veteran left-back Christopher Lenz on Thursday afternoon.
